# delegate

**Instance Property**

A delegate that receives updates on the state of the accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any HMAccessoryDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Tracking changes to an accessory

- **HMAccessoryDelegate**: A set of methods that defines the communication method for state updates from accessories to their delegates.

items.description: A set of methods that defines the communication method for state updates from accessories to their delegates.
